description:
Description
After search click the search bar should be cleared

Steps to Reproduce
Move to https://openmf.github.io/web-app/home and search, its not working and also not clearing after search.

Expected Behaviour
After search click the search bar should be cleared

Actual Behaviour
After search click the search bar is not cleared which decrease the user experience

Settings
Mifos X version: 0.0.0
Browser used: chrome/firefox
name: After search click the search bar should be cleared for good user experience
